about_the_game:
In Golden Voyage, you take on the role of a merchant determined to brave the sea of islands. As a mythical dragon arrives on your home island demanding tribute. You have just one year to amass enough wealth to appease its insatiable greed. Failure to meet the dragon's demands could spell doom for your people, but maybe the coin you’ve gained could earn you its favor—Or perhaps another year to prove yourself.

Buy Low, Sell High

Each week, the demand from each island changes! Will you take a risk by betting heavily on one product, hoping to find the perfect market somewhere else? Or will you play it safe by diversifying your inventory?
The choice is yours in this dynamic trading adventure.

Plan your route

As you sail around, precious time will be spent, so you will have to plan your moves accordingly. As sometimes the sea offers chance encounters for you to seek out, for better or worse. Requiring you to divert your course, potentially missing a good market.

Explore the Sea

The sea of islands is rich not only with goods to trade but also with opportunities. Building relationships with the right people can help you on your voyage, And sometimes potential encounters will appear on the horizon, offering a mix of challenges and opportunities. These events can range from a calm fishing trip to uncovering hidden secrets, adding an element of surprise and adventure to your journey.


Will you play it safe, sticking to known routes to ensure steady profit, or will you venture into uncharted waters, seeking out rare treasures and untold stories? The sea is vast and full of surprises; it's up to you to navigate its mysteries and gather the wealth needed to save your home. Your journey in the Golden Voyage is as much about the wealth you earn as it is about the stories you collect. Can you rise to the challenge and win the dragon's favor? The clock is ticking, and the sea awaits!

name: Golden Voyage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 1903 and newer versions
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 1903 and newer versions
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen R5-1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: To save your island from a dragon, you must sail the island sea. Buy low, sell high! You were given a year to amass enough wealth for the dragon, will you be able to make it? Or will you have enough to bargain for more time? This is the beginning of your GOLDEN VOYAGE...
